roleset.name: (cause to) emit clicking sound
roleset.note: CLICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'click' based on sentences in wsj. VN classes hit-18.1, sound_emission-43.2, crane-40.3.2. Framenet entries Motion noise and Perception noise. (from click.01-v)
CLICK-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry click.01, OntoNotes grouping click-n senses 1, 2& 4; maps to VN class hit-18.1 & sound_emission-43.2; Framed by Claire. (from click.01-n)

example.name: both args
example.text: Several times, Chinese guards have pointed their automatic rifles at young children of U.S. diplomats and clicked the trigger.

example.name: ergative
example.text: John's alarm clock clicked loudly on his bedside stand.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: The linguist demonstrated to the class how to produce a click of the tongue.

example.name: Arg1 only again, new semantics
example.text: Mary selected a link with the click of her mouse.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The long wait between her click of the shutter and the shopkeeper's delivery of prints took toll of her patience

roleset.name: have good relations
roleset.note: CLICK-V NOTES: Added by julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to get_along.18. (from click.02-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: Sometimes the first therapist you see wo n't work for you , but if that happens , keep trying and look for a different counsellor until you find one who-1 you click with *-1 , because it will be worth it I promise you .
